eas_text: A civil authority has issued A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Hockley; Howard; Martin; Yoakum; Lubbock; Terry; Lynn; Cochran; Andrews; Dawson; Loving; Gaines; Midland; Borden; Winkler; Ector; Garza, TX; at 05:40 PM ON DEC 30, 2025 Effective until 05:40 PM DEC 31, 2025. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: AMBER Alert: Child Abduction from Plains, Texas. Suspect vehicle is a black 20 10 Ford F 150 pickup truck with Texas license plate WGV9997. Missing child is Maryui Yolani Gomez Marquez, 15 year old hispanic female. Suspect is Juan Orlando Garcia Sarmiento, 41 year old hispanic male. Call the Texas Department of Public Safety with information. If seen call 9 1 1. AMBER Alert: Child Abduction from Plains, Texas. Suspect vehicle is a black 2010 Ford F-150 pickup truck with Texas license plate WGV9997. Missing child is Maryui Yolani Gomez Marquez, 15 year old hispanic female. Suspect is Juan Orlando Garcia Sarmiento, 41 year old hispanic male. Call the Texas Department of Public Safety with information. If seen call 911.
